DOC.brief_summary: In study , healthy human subject ( 18-35 yr ) randomise consume 1200 mg ibuprofen 75 mg acetylsalicylic acid daily training period 8 week . During week , subject perform 2-3 supervised strength training session ( knee extension ) . Before training , muscle volume measure MRI , muscle strength assess isokinetic isoinertial ergometer . Muscle biopsy obtain m. vastus lateralis study gene protein expression marker regulate muscle protein turnover prostaglandin synthesis .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects COX-inhibiting Drugs Skeletal Muscle Adaptations Resistance Exercise Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Considered healthy Moderately trained 1835 yr Cardiovascular disease Impaired kidney liver function Lower limb injury Pregnancy Ulcer gastrointestinal upset Previous reaction use NSAID
